thread.section_title: Guardian Self Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Guardian Self Storage | guardianselfstorage.com
thread.title: Jennifer
thread.title_full: Guardian Self Storage reviewed by Jennifer

author: Jennifer
title: Jennifer
text: I originally spoke to George the manager on the phone and for quite a bit of time considering I was calling to self storage business and he listened to my whole story as some of it was probably totally unnecessary for him to even know and yet he was patient and give me all sorts of options the options were all to make my life easier and when I got there a few days later he remembered me and easily took me on a little tour of some of the units luckily for me the first unit he showed me was absolutely perfect super clean Super new looking easy-to-use and accessible 24 hours a day and at a price that is totally reasonable in fact I did actually shop around and did not find another rate better then his and I said even if I did find one they would be considerate two the possibility of matching it if that was something we could do luckily we didn't have to do that but I would highly recommend this place and definitely ask for George he will give you a VIP treatment even if we're only just talking about a storage unit it's always a good feeling to walk away feeling like your hard-earned money is valued by the people you're giving it to
